name: John Wick: NYC Noir
detailed_description: Join John Wick’s Production Designer as he talks about how he & the rest of the crew turned one of America’s most famous cities into a character all its own.
about_the_game: Join John Wick’s Production Designer as he talks about how he & the rest of the crew turned one of America’s most famous cities into a character all its own.
short_description: Join John Wick's Production Designer as he talks about how he & the rest of the crew turned one of America’s most famous cities into a character all its own.
